entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 05:55 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.8°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: N 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Overcast. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
